title: RTR~
author: RTR~
content: My rank is jr.member. I can't post in Alts of any-one thread..so iam create new topic.Iam found a Bounty cheater with multiple alts.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on November 24, 2022, 01:09:54 PM3.Juwel5804.Rjakash2 Accounts Connected: (Note: Banned shown in red / Inactive in Blue / Active Sakib1511AbidAymanProof:[Achieve]Proof:[Achieve]Proof:[Achieve]Related Addresses:Code:BSC wallet 0xf4d21962FD833EC9298bB5b0Baf5d5d5e1811c53Miscellaneous:These two users have registered the same bounty, used the same wallet for proof of authentication twice, i don't think it is a mistake. From my research i think these two accounts are operated by one person.BOUNTY REGISTEREDBounty registered [Bounty 2.0] OzoneChain Bounty manager; sujonali1819Bounty registered  NonFungibleX  Bounty manager; julerz12the transfer of transactions:Juwel580 her transfer of transactions:He send bnb From: 0xbE565Ba6De18Bf642a1c085d9cBcC5e724e28B84 to: 0x77a4aa944910D1405Ae016A79964eE7525556A92@Sakib1511 send bnbFrom: 0xf4d21962FD833EC9298bB5b0Baf5d5d5e1811c53To: 0x77a4aa944910D1405Ae016A79964eE7525556A92Related Addresses: Code:0x77a4aa944910D1405Ae016A79964eE7525556A922. From: 0x77a4aa944910D1405Ae016A79964eE7525556A92 To: 0xf4d21962FD833EC9298bB5b0Baf5d5d5e1811c53(Sakib1511)3. From: 0x77a4aa944910D1405Ae016A79964eE7525556A92To: 0x05AAe3a5437de4178c62b187B6F6c1Dd7f328283(AbidAyman)

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.created_time: November 16, 2023, 05:23:00 PMLast edit: November 16, 2023, 06:39:07 PM by Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Hello OP , Nice catch but I will recommend you to report this scam in the thread where lovemyfamilis reported. You already familiar with this thread because your quoted from there.I am now going deep to this matter and will update here soon

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: RTR~ on November 16, 2023, 05:14:59 PMMy rank is jr.member. I can't post in Alts of any-one thread..so iam create new topic.That's weird but it's the topic starters rule so better to respect it. If you want to earn some merit then you can participate in this topic. You may learn something new. You still need 7 merits to change your rank.Quote from: RTR~ on November 16, 2023, 05:14:59 PMThese two users have registered the same bounty, used the same wallet for proof of authentication twice, i don't think it is a mistake. From my research i think these two accounts are operated by one personBut we can't tell confidently that they are indeed alt however the circumstance leads to suspect they are alt.

comments.author: RTR~
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on November 16, 2023, 05:23:00 PMBTW what will you say about this? what is your relationship with Rojina678plz read this topic I have already answered these. They have nothing to do with me.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on November 16, 2023, 05:23:00 PMHello OP , Nice catch but I will recommend you to report this scam in the thread where lovemyfamilis reported. You already familiar with this thread because your quoted from there.I am now going deep to this matter and will update here soonfrom the looks of it, he can't, timelord deleted OP's post and told him that on that thread, newbies and jr members cannot post on the thread.anyway, I feel like this thread should be on the reputation board only because I see posts like this being posted on the reputation board.Quote from: Timelord2067 on November 16, 2023, 04:25:51 PM@RTR~ - no newbies or Junior Members (please read the first post)

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: RTR~ on November 16, 2023, 05:39:37 PMQuote from: Gladitorcomeback on November 16, 2023, 05:23:00 PMBTW what will you say about this? what is your relationship with Rojina678plz read this topic I have already answered these. They have nothing to do with me.Ok thanks, I got it, actually RTR~ and RTR!  make confusion for me. Recieving funds first time from wallet own by member already catched for scamming is suspicious but without strong proof we cannot add review on any profile.Quote from: acroman08 on November 16, 2023, 08:12:41 PMfrom the looks of it, he can't, timelord deleted OP's post and told him that on that thread, newbies and jr members cannot post on the thread. Oh I missed that, OP have to be atleast member to report there. Anyway another thread is looking best suitable for such kind of reportNutildah's bounty cheaters & ban evaders threadQuote from: RTR~ on November 16, 2023, 05:39:37 PManyway, I feel like this thread should be on the reputation board only because I see posts like this being posted on the reputation board.Yes because there is no direct scam involved in this matter. Reported users broke only forum rules + compaign rules by using two or more accounts to get more reward from bounty and this thread should be on the reputation section. I am reporting moderator to transfer it.

comments.author: RTR~
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on November 17, 2023, 01:57:09 AMOk thanks, I got it, actually RTR~ and RTR!  make confusion for me. Recieving funds first time from wallet own by member already catched for scamming is suspicious but without strong proof we cannot add review on any profile.Ok no problem..plz Here is see @Sakib1511's Instagram profile picture and @AbidAyman Facebook profile picture here.  2 people look alike.  Definitions say that 2 people are the same person.
